casebody.data:
No. 11-7042. Melvin R. Kerchee, Jr., Petitioner v. Justin Jones, Director, Oklahoma Department of Corrections. 565 U.S. 1121, 132 S. Ct. 1020,

181 L. Ed. 2d 753,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 403, January 9, 2012.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 428 Fed. Appx. 851.
